question: You give a book on a frozen pond a hard push and it moves away from you.  It keeps moving for quite along time after you have pushed it and eventually stops a long distance from you.  For clarity, we are interested in the motion of the book after you have pushed it (i.e. when you are not touching the book).  Which of the following explanations for why the book eventually stops is the most consistent with the model proposed in the video that you just watched?
